title: Civil society is individuals expressing interests

content.question: Which of the following best describes civil society?

choices.label: Individuals organizing and expressing their interests
Individuals making their interests known through voting
Legislators meeting in small groups and discussing specific policy objectives
The head of state appointing a group of individuals to investigate policy outcomes

content.answer: Individuals organizing and expressing their interests

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
